OrgName: GT Nexus, Inc. and all its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: GT Nexus hosts a web-based technology platform that enables its customers, buyers and sellers of finished goods, to conduct their trade transactions by entering data onto the Platform. To the extent that GT Nexus may receive "personal information" from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland in connection with these transactions, GT Nexus would process and store such data on its servers located in the USA.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, postal address, email address, phone number, credit card information. Data covered includes manually processed data.
